name: Solar Tune-Up Rebate
description: Up to $1,500 rebate for solar PV system tune-up by CA licensed contractor
fullDescription: Silicon Valley Power offers rebates for Santa Clara residents to have their existing solar PV systems professionally inspected and tuned up, ensuring optimal performance and energy generation.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $1,500 rebate for solar tune-up
- Professional system inspection
- Performance optimization
- Identification of issues or degradation
- Cleaning and maintenance
- Ensures maximum energy production
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a Silicon Valley Power customer
2. Must have existing solar PV system
3. Hire California licensed contractor
4. Have system inspected and tuned up
5. Apply online through SVP rebate platform
6. Submit contractor invoice and documentation
keywords: Silicon Valley Power, SVP, solar tune-up, Santa Clara, $1500, solar maintenance, PV inspection, performance optimization
